subject: Real Estate
title: Construction Defect Claims
description: Learn Construction Defect Claims in one minute.

hook.text: You move into a new home and within a year, cracks appear in the foundation. Who's responsible?

buildup.text: Construction defect claims target builders, architects, or subcontractors for faulty workmanship or materials.

discovery.text: Statutes of repose limit how long after construction you can file â€” typically 6 to 10 years.

twist.text: Defect claims in large condo developments can involve hundreds of homeowners suing a single builder.

climax.text: Construction defects are expensive to fix and expensive to litigate. Prevention is always cheaper.

punchline.text: A crack in the wall can crack open a lawsuit.
